testcase.name: TC04_LoginWithMultipleWrongPasswordAttempts

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Error message is not displayed correctly expected [Invalid username or password. Please try again] but found [Invalid username or password. Please try again.], Attempt limit warning message is not displayed expected [You have used 4 out of 5 login attempts. After all 5 have been used, you will be unable to login for 15 minutes.] but found [Invalid username or password. Please try again.]
